about.name: Andrii Deisan
about.summary: A front-end developer with commercial experience in web applications development.  Good knowledge of JavaScript, React, HTML & CSS. Practical experience of development from layout to release in a product company. Strong at taking responsibility for my work results, appreciative of feedback, adaptable to business environments changes, keeping productivity and effectiveness on the same level.

work_experience.description: Created interactive user interfaces in React and Typescript with the help of state managers Redux Toolkit and Effector; a tool for working with forms – Formik; for stylization – CSS Modules and a component library Chakra UI; for requests from the server – Apollo GraphQL; for working with REST API – fetch/axios; the architectural methodology of Feature-Sliced Design; for task planning – Asana.

Filming and editing of video materials; writing of scripts for the videos; working with light and sound equipment; launching videos; managing videos at various stages of post-production; knowing how to use keywords; tracking post assets: thumbnails, captions, etc.; implementing advanced knowledge of Adobe post-production; using various codecs, luts, standard post processes; maintaining channel quality, organization, and content governance.
Site administration; content creating, managing and editing; photo and video editing; using SEO knowledge for content optimization; content localization; working with CRM system.
Social media marketing; setting up advertisement campaigns; forum moderation and support.

education.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript – Successfully graduated and presented the final project. Certificate: https://htmlacademy.ru/profile/deysan/certificates
